query.comment: Safety: System never reaches deadlock state

query.formula: A[] ((oven.baking imply temp == TARGET_TEMP) and (freezer.freeze imply freezer_temp == FREEZE_TEMP))
query.comment: Safety: Baking and freezing only occur at target temperatures
Safety: Stock level never negative
Safety: Pizza production never exceeds maximum capacity

query.formula: A[] (dough_stock >= 0 and sauce_stock >= 0 and cheese_stock >= 0 and meat_stock >= 0 and veg_stock >= 0)
query.comment: Safety: Machine stock levels never become negative

query.formula: A[] (dough_warehouse >= 0 and sauce_warehouse >= 0 and cheese_warehouse >= 0 and meat_warehouse >= 0 and veg_warehouse >= 0)
query.comment: Safety: Warehouse stock levels never become negative
Reachability: Oven can reach baking state
Reachability: Packaging robot can reach operating state
Reachability: Freezer can reach freezing state
Reachability: Goods provider can supply ingredients
Reachability: Dough machine can trigger restocking
Reachability: Warehouse can request external supplies
Reachability: System can reach maximum production capacity
Reachability: Oven and freezer can operate simultaneously
Reachability: Buffers can become full (bottleneck detection)
Capacity: System reaches full production capacity during operation
Liveness: Restocking state eventually leads to dispatch
Liveness: Orders eventually reach packaging (end-to-end flow)
Liveness: Dough machine restocking eventually completes
Liveness: Warehouse orders eventually arrive

query.formula: A[] ( (doughShaper.shapingDough imply doughShaper.t <= 2) and (doughMachine.kneading imply doughMachine.t <= 5) and (sauceMachine.addToPizza imply sauceMachine.t <= 5) and (meatSlicer.addToPizza imply meatSlicer.t <= 5) and (cheeseGrater.addToPizza imply cheeseGrater.t <= 5) )
query.comment: Perfomance: All ingredient processing steps must strictly adhere to their maximum time constraints (in time units), across all possible execution paths of the system. This verifies the simultaneous compliance of all critical topping and dough preparation stages (Dough Shaping 2, Kneading 5, and all topping additions 5) with the specified timing requirements.
Performance: Oven can be busy while pizzas wait (utilization check)
Performance: Detects bottleneck at dough shaper
Performance: Detects bottleneck at vegetable slicer
Performance: Detects bottleneck at cheese grater
